scripts.dev: npm run build && env-cmd -r env.yaml npx @google-cloud/functions-framework --target=main --source=dist
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp package*.json dist && gcloud functions deploy fuftyfu-bot --gen2 --trigger-http --runtime nodejs20 --entry-point=main --allow-unauthenticated --region=us-central1 --source=dist --update-build-env-vars="GOOGLE_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=" --project zinovik-project --set-secrets=TELEGRAM_TOKEN=fuftyfu-bot-telegram-token:latest,TOKEN=fuftyfu-bot-app-token:latest
